1.title: Stekbords Krigare
1.info: I got the pleasure to work as a chef at ZupBurger. I was the boss of a foodtruck located in Falkenberg at summer times and in Varberg during the rest of the year. I helped ZupBuger grow to another city and increased the value of the bussniess by roughly 20% during 2022

2.title: Guest Experience Leader
2.info: My time as an Guest Experience Leader at McDonalds Varberg Nord was an important time for me to learn more and dive deeper into customer engagements. This was the begining of my journey within the food industry.

profile.name: Theo Esberg
profile.title: Junior System Developer
profile.about: Hey! My name is Theo Esberg and I am a Junior Software Developer located in Varberg, Sweden. I love to program different types of projects. One of my favorit categories of programming is game development but I would love to learn more about AI and Machine Learning since the posibilites that opens up is insane!
